messages.title: Standing up for local people
messages.content: Local champion, Richard Burt is already making a difference in West Worcestershire. He has successfully campaigned with others to protect out vital NHS services, student travel grants and lunch clubs for older people. Over the past four years, Richard has helped hundreds of local residents with everyday problems. Everyone knows it is Richard Burt who has been standing up for our area.

messages.title: What the papers say
messages.content: The Conservative candidate for West Worcestershire...is fighting to save the seat... from the Lib Dems." - The Times, 12th January 2010"Sir Michael Spicer [has] let himself down in his reaction to the Westminster expenses scandal...Ordered to repay more than £15,000 of public money...The West Worcestershire MP has failed again" - Worcester News, 5th February 2010

messages.title: Odds shorten on Lib Dem win
messages.content: Bookies dismiss Labour's chances here. Ladbrokes odds as everyone knows that a vote for Labour in West Worcestershire sends voters elsewhere. Ladbrokes odds are back Richard Burt to beat the Conservatives.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Ladbrokes odds as everyone knows that a vote for Labour in West Worcestershire sends voters elsewhere.

issues.health: He has successfully campaigned with others to protect out vital NHS services

Sir Michael Spicer [has] let himself down in his reaction to the Westminster expenses scandal...Ordered to repay more than £15,000 of public money...The West Worcestershire MP has failed again.
